page.title: 09Employment - Dalkeith
page.content: Dalkeith has a wide range of industries some established over a century ago, while others were attracted a few years ago to the Thornybank Industrial Estate. The industrial importance of the town is underlined by its modern and well-equipped technical and commercial college. The largest employers in Dalkeith are Laidlaw and Fairgrieve Ltd (wool trade), Chas. Letts and Co Ltd (book printing) and Ferranti Ltd (electronic and mechanical engineering). Dalkeith and district has always been noted for the excellent type of labour to be found here. Very good relations have existed for many years between management and employees; the lack of industrial disputes is evidence of these good relations.
